turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor matematik problemini düşünsem, belki çözüm bulabilirim.
english_example_sentence: If I were to think about this difficult math problem, maybe I could find a solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я подумал об этой сложной математической задаче, может быть, я найду решение.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor matematik problemini ______, belki çözüm bulabilirim.
